job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Trading Systems - Prestigious Prop Trading Firm - Austin</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>I’m working with a very well-known and prestigious trading firm who are looking to make a key hire in their Software Engineering/Machine Learning team. This team work hand-in-hand with traders and quant researchers to build and improve their machine-learning based trading systems. The team has grown steadily over the past 7 years and now one of their leading business initiatives is to scale this team to become as large and profitable as their other trading groups.</p><p><br></p><ul><li>Implement ML features, models, and strategies for use in&nbsp;backtest, simulation, and production.&nbsp;</li><li>Manage an in-house compute and data cluster, job scheduler, and Python-based pipeline to provide robust, efficient 24/7&nbsp;backtest/simulation/research environment.&nbsp;</li><li>Develop low-level Linux C/C++ software with FPGA integration to achieve world-class latencies.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p>This is an extremely exciting opportunity which is not only very lucrative, but also offers significant advancement opportunities as the firm continues to dominate this space.</p><p><br></p><p>There is a very generous compensation package on offer. Unfortunately, this firm is not currently offering sponsorship at this time.</p>
